amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending in the bill by $13,533,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to reduce spending in the bill by $13,533,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 267 (Roll no. 625).
